alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 4:18PM EST until December 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of under one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Western Passaic County. In New York, Northern Westchester, Orange, Rockland and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
